author: guitargeek
body:
This is the backport of two other external PRs to 10_2_X:
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4312
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4332

This is to enable the backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24432 which should fix issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/26154.

The two backports come in a single PR so they can be used together when testing the backport in CMSSW.

Please don't test for now, as the CMSSW backport is not ready yet.
title: [10.2.X] Backport 4312 and 4332 to enable backport of cmssw/24432
